description.value:
Specialised Bionic Eyes. Gives same benefits as Bionic Eye, but can be activated/deactivated as Half Action to gain Unnatural Ballistic Skill (+1) (or +2 if Best Craftsmanship), but suffer -20 to Awareness Tests. Can't benefit from any sight attached to gun while using this.

Requirements

Bionc Eye: Poor: -20 to tests involving the sense, Good: gain relevent Heightened Senses Talent, and +20 to resists to resist attacks to that sense, such as blinding flashes.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
